summary: This mod retexture all horses of Skyrim, and add new stables to the other big town: Falkreath, Dawnstar, Morthal and Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21834] [size=40][color=orange]Automatic Variants Port - Zira[/color][/size] [/url]
[color=orange]Thanks to wolverine2710 for compiling these.[/color]

[img]http://kepek.freemail.hu/fototar/kepek/00/02/19/56/27/U0002195627/T00000001341140083734/5402362.gif[/img]

 This mod retexture all horses of Skyrim, and add new stables to the other big town: 
 Falkreath, Dawnstar, Morthal and Winterhold.
 
 Details:
 ======
   -  high resolution textures: 2048x2048 pixels
   -  22 new horse color
   -  5 new retextured saddle and bridle
   -  new stables


 The horses are divided into two main types:
 =========================================
Original horses: those horses, that you can buy in the original stables. I not modifty the AI of these horses. 

New horses: those horses, that I add to the game. They are mostly found in of the new stables. 
They learn about their names (not simply „Horse”). The new horses can not be buyable, 
they have no owner. You can use them freely. An important difference is that these horses
do not return to the stables, they NOT WANDERN. They will remain where you leave them.

 Other features of horses: 
  - All the horse is essential.
  - I increased the speed of all horses with 25%. 


 You need to choose one of the four type:
 =======================================
 1. Zira\'s Skyrim Horse Base:
     Horses with retextured saddle and bridle. 

  2. Zira\'s Skyrim Horse Base - Bareback Riding:
     Horses with only bridle, for those who like to ride without a saddle.

  3. Zira\'s Skyrim Horse Base - No Tack
     Horses without any tack.

  4. Zira\'s Skyrim Horse Base - Armored
     Horses with the beautiful armors from „Horse Armors for Skyrim” mod by Mystikhybrid.

  YOU CAN CHOOSE ONLY ONE. 
  THIS FOUR TYPE IT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH EACH OTHER.


 REQUIREMENTS:
 =============
  - Skyrim


 COMPATIBILITY:
 ==============
 This mod not compatible with mods, which also modify these horses, or with those mods, 
 that built any buildings on the place of the new stables.
 
 INSTALL:
 ========
 Copy the textures folder, meshes folder and the .esp file of the selected modtype 
 to your Skyrim/Data Folder.


 Thanks:
 =======
 Thanks to Mystikhybrid for his beautiful horse armors from „Horse Armors for Skyrim” mod.


 Legal: 
 ======
 Textures can be used by any modder. 
 My mods are free to be translated into other languages.

 I only need some credit.
 Mention me as the original creator of the textures in the Readme.

 Thank you for downloading this mod, enjoy the new horses! :)
author: zira
